name: 2D Shooter Prototype v0.09k (On hold)
description:
Controls:

  • Move: ASDW/Arrow keys
  • Jump/double jump: Space
  • Primary fire: Left click
  • Secondary fire/special action: Right click
  • Use: E
  • Flashlight: F
  • Select weapons:
    • Pistol: 1
    • Shotgun: 2
    • Auto rifle: 3
    • Rocket launcher: 4
    • Grenade: G
  • Teleport ability: Shift + Left click
  • Drone control change: T
  • Drone primary fire: Middle click
  • Drone secondary fire: B (needs 4 charges)
  • Pause Menu: Esc

Dev "hakks":

  • Resize window: Ctrl + Y
  • Pause: P
